sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Button, CloseButton, Modal} from "react-bootstrap"; function ModalDetail({isOpen, hideModal, dataModal}){ return( <> Student

Student ID: {dataModal.id}

Fullname: {dataModal.fullname}

Birth Date: {dataModal.birthday}

Signup Date: {dataModal.signupdate}

Family contact: {dataModal.familycontact}

Parent email: {dataModal.parenemail}

Phone number: {dataModal.parenemail}

Student status: {dataModal.parenemail}

Question:
{dataModal.question}

{/*
*/}

Answer:
{dataModal.answer}

.col-md-6
); } export default ModalDetail
